title: Introduction to Neural Network-Based NLP for Social Media Data Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and interest in social science data
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented course using VR simulations in smartphone-centric limited environments. Continuous monitoring of learning effectiveness through formative assessment

learning_goals: Sentiment analysis can be performed on social media text data
Topic modeling results using neural network-based models (BERT/GPT, etc.) can be interpreted
Data visualization reports can be generated using mobile-friendly NLP tools in resource-constrained technical environments

resources: Social media sample dataset (anonymized public data)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
